main_title: Murder That Sparked a Brazilian Political Revolution
hook: [dramatic] João Pessoa’s assassination in 1930 was no ordinary crime—it ignited a political firestorm! This influential Brazilian lawmaker was gunned down, leading to whispers of a conspiracy among rival factions.
description: João Pessoa's assassination led to a coup that changed Brazil forever. What really happened? #BrazilHistory #PoliticalRevolution #JoãoPessoa
